footer.tagline: Luxury interior design studio creating exceptional spaces
footer.copyright: © 2024 TRQ Design Studio. All rights reserved.
home.introText1: TRQ STUDIO is an interior design studio that crafts luxurious spaces embodying elegance through a holistic approach that harmoniously balances aesthetics, functionality, and sensory experience.
home.introText2: The studio delivers fully integrated design solutions that respect context and identity, executed to the highest standards across high-end residential, commercial, and distinguished institutional projects.
home.servicesSubtitle: Comprehensive design solutions tailored to your unique vision and requirements
home.featuredSubtitle: A glimpse of our latest work and design excellence
home.howWeWorkSubtitle: A seamless process designed to bring your vision to life
home.ctaDescription: Let's discuss your project and create something exceptional together. Contact our team today.
about.heroSubtitle: Crafting exceptional spaces through vision, expertise, and dedication
about.whoWeAreText1: TRQ is a luxury and creative interior design studio based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Founded on principles of excellence, innovation, and client-centric service, we have established ourselves as a leading design partner.
about.whoWeAreText2: Our multidisciplinary team brings expertise in interior design, architecture, furniture design, and project management to deliver comprehensive solutions that exceed expectations.
about.whoWeAreText3: Whether designing intimate residential spaces or grand commercial environments, we approach every project with the same level of dedication, creativity, and attention to detail that has become our hallmark.
about.visionText: To be recognized as the leading luxury design studio in Saudi Arabia and beyond, setting new standards for creative excellence and transforming spaces into timeless works of art.
about.missionText: To deliver exceptional and bespoke design solutions that reflect our clients' unique vision while exceeding their expectations. We are committed to combining artistic innovation with practical expertise.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our work and define our approach to design
about.value1Desc: We strive for the highest standards in every project, ensuring exceptional quality and meticulous attention to detail.
about.value2Desc: We embrace creativity and push boundaries to deliver unique and forward-thinking design solutions.
about.value3Desc: We work closely with our clients, valuing their input and building lasting partnerships.
about.value4Desc: Our love for design drives us to create spaces that inspire and delight.
about.whyChooseSubtitle: What sets us apart in the world of luxury interior design
about.why1Desc: Specialists in high-end residential and commercial projects requiring the finest craftsmanship.
about.why2Desc: From concept to completion, we manage every aspect of your project with meticulous care.
about.why3Desc: Deep understanding of Saudi culture combined with global design perspectives.
about.why4Desc: Successfully delivered outstanding projects across residential, commercial, and exhibition sectors.
about.impactText1: We don't just design spaces—we transform the way our clients live, work, and experience their environments. Through thoughtful design and meticulous execution, we create spaces that inspire and elevate daily life.
about.impactText2: Our success is measured not just by completed projects, but by our clients' satisfaction and happiness. Every project is an opportunity to make a lasting positive impact.
services.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive design solutions for every space
workflow.heroSubtitle: A seamless process designed to bring your vision to life
workflow.introText: At TRQ, we believe that exceptional design requires a structured yet flexible approach. Our five-step process ensures that every project receives the attention, expertise, and care it deserves.
workflow.whySubtitle: Built on years of experience and refined through countless successful projects
workflow.timelineText1: While every project is unique, most projects follow a similar timeline. Residential projects typically take 3-6 months from concept to completion.
workflow.timelineText2: During our initial consultation, we'll provide you with a detailed timeline specific to your project scope and requirements.
workflow.ctaText: Let's start with a consultation to discuss your project and explore how we can bring your vision to life.
portfolio.heroSubtitle: Showcase of our latest projects and design excellence
portfolio.introText: Each project represents our commitment to excellence, creativity, and attention to detail. From intimate residential spaces to grand commercial environments, our portfolio showcases the breadth and depth of our design expertise.
portfolio.ctaText: Ready to start your own design journey? Get in touch with our team to discuss your vision.
blog.heroSubtitle: Insights, trends, and inspiration from our design studio
blog.newsletterText: Subscribe to receive our latest articles, design insights, and project updates directly in your inbox.
blog.privacyNote: We respect your privacy. You can unsubscribe at any time.
contact.heroSubtitle: Let's discuss your project and create something exceptional together
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.messageReceived: Your message has been received. We'll be in touch soon.
contact.subject: Subject *
contact.visitStudioText: Schedule an appointment to visit our design studio.
contact.openInMaps: Click to open in Google Maps
pricing.heroSubtitle: Get a custom quote for your design project
pricing.successText: Thank you for your interest in TRQ Design Studio. We've received your pricing request and will review it carefully.
pricing.step1Desc: Our team will review your project details within 24 hours.
pricing.step2Desc: We'll reach out to discuss your project in more detail.
pricing.step3Desc: We'll prepare a detailed quote with pricing tailored to your needs.
pricing.formIntroText: Please provide as much detail as possible about your project. The more we know, the more accurate our quote will be.
pricing.emailMethodDesc: We'll send you a detailed quote
pricing.expectText: Our pricing process is transparent and tailored to your needs
pricing.expect1Desc: We carefully review your requirements and project scope to understand your vision.
pricing.expect2Desc: We prepare a comprehensive quote with detailed pricing and project timeline.
pricing.expect3Desc: We schedule a meeting to discuss the quote and answer any questions you have.
projectDetail.letDiscuss: Let's discuss how we can create something exceptional for you.
projectDetail.defaultQuote: Working with TRQ was an exceptional experience. They transformed our vision into reality with creativity, professionalism, and meticulous attention to detail. The result exceeded all our expectations.
blogArticle.authorBio: A passionate writer exploring the intersection of design, architecture, and lifestyle. With over 10 years of experience in the interior design industry, bringing insights and inspiration to design enthusiasts worldwide.
blogArticle.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest design insights, project updates, and exclusive content.
blogArticle.defaultQuote: Working with TRQ was an exceptional experience. They transformed our vision into reality with creativity, professionalism, and meticulous attention to detail.
